DESCRIPTION: Pay shown #yMana cost on this card for a bonus effect. NL If a cards #yStyle cost cannot be payed gain 1 #yMana of it's type instead.
Right click this card in your hand to pay the cost on this card and #ySuspend it for #b1 turn and is #yForetold until played. NL #yForetold cards do not grant #yMana when played.
#ySuspending a card #yexhausts it, when #ySuspend expires return it to your hand, it costs 0 and has #yRetain until played.
creature with #yDestiny #yKnot take additional damage equal to half the damage taken by creature with #yDestiny #yKnot
#yMana is produced by Ruinteller cards except for basic Strikes and Defends and is spent by #yStyle effects and to #yFortell cards.
#yThread effects occur whenever this card enters the draw or discard pile
